title: Prisoner Swap One Of Several Tough Moments For Obama In Recent Weeks
teaser: NPR's National Political Correspondent Mara Liasson talks with Arun Rath about the controversial Berghdal POW swap, the roll out of tougher emissions standards and systemic problems within the VA.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
